Who is Kirtiraj Thakor?

A Bit About Me

I am a sophomore student pursuing Computer Science and Engineering from Drs. Kiran and Pallavi Patel Global University Vadodara, Gujarat.

As I've grown as a developer, I've contributed to projects and worked with other developers to create awesome projects.

I've a good understanding of web development concepts and have made some good frontend projects.

I am very passionate about improving my problem-solving skills. I solve DSA problems in various websites like Leetcode, Codechef, etc.

I am also a competitive programmer.
